remarks: The set of words taking values in a subset is a (free) submonoid of the free monoid.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2016.)
statement:
frmdmnd.m $e |- M = ( freeMnd ` I ) $.
frmdsssubm $p |- ( ( I e. V /\ J C_ I ) -> Word J e. ( SubMnd ` M ) ) $.
